evs.name: Application for birth allowance
evs.description: The application is submitted electronically through the OPEKA platform or via Citizens’ Service Centers (KEP).

evs.name: ID Card or Passport
evs.description: Identification of the applicant using a valid ID card or passport is required.

evs.name: Child’s Birth Certificate
evs.description: The child’s birth must be registered in the Municipal Registry.

evs.name: Tax ID (AFM) and Social Security Number (AMKA) of parents
evs.description: The parents’ AFM and AMKA are required for the allowance to be granted.

evs.name: Bank Account (IBAN)
evs.description: The applicant must declare a valid bank account (IBAN) to receive the allowance.

criterion_requirments.name: The mother must be a permanent resident of Greece for at least 12 years
The child must be born in Greece
The application must be submitted within 3 months from the child’s birth
The family income must not exceed the threshold set by the program
